description:
`furo-data-bool-icon`
Displays a icon/symbol for a boolean value

This component uses utf-8 symbols for true and false at the moment.
name: FuroDataBoolIcon

members.name: _initBinder
members.description:
inits the universalFieldNodeBinder.
Set the mapped attributes and labels.

members.name: symboltrue
members.description: Defines the symbol for the true state

members.name: symbolfalse
members.description: Defines the symbol for the false state

attributes.name: symboltrue
attributes.description: Defines the symbol for the true state

attributes.name: symbolfalse
attributes.description: Defines the symbol for the false state

summary: Displays a icon/symbol for a boolean value
